title: Notorious
description: "Anyways, truth or not, here is what I found. Make of it what you will..." Tabatha Magsaysay has no idea what she's gotten into. High school is bad enough with the cliques, the homework, the drama, and just growing up in general. However, with a school at the brink of total warfare, a mysterious vigilante threatening the balance, a demonic bully out to get her, an angelic figure who refuses to help her, and a deadly secret hidden behind the walls of Sinclair Academy, who even has time for that?
author: Mara Joaquin
